TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
She is gone.
She is gone.
She is gone.
She is gone.
She was already gone, Syrus. This was not Liandra, only her body.
She was already gone, Syrus. This was not Liandra, only her body.
She was already gone, Syrus. This was not Liandra, only her body.
She was already gone, Syrus. This was not Liandra, only her body.
I must burn her and take the ashes back to her father, Lord Greythane, in Maethelburg.
I must burn her and take the ashes back to her father, Lord Greythane, in Maethelburg.
I must burn her and take the ashes back to her father, Lord Greythane, in Maethelburg.
I must burn her and take the ashes back to her father, Lord Greythane, in Maethelburg.
But Lord Greythane said never to return.
But Lord Greythane said never to return.
But Lord Greythane said never to return.
But Lord Greythane said never to return.
Unless I had Liandra with me. And now I do.
Unless I had Liandra with me. And now I do.
Unless I had Liandra with me. And now I do.
Unless I had Liandra with me. And now I do.
Very well, Syrus. I'm coming with you.
Very well, Syrus. I'm coming with you.
Very well, Syrus. I'm coming with you.
Very well, Syrus. I'm coming with you.
